title: Rollic CEO Burak Vardal on the Shift from Hyper-Casual to Hybrid (Part 1)
alt: Burak Vardal speaks with the team at Rollic HQ about moving from hyper-casual to hybrid – Part 1
excerpt: How Turkey’s Rollic pivoted from hyper-casual to hybrid—and why the team’s ‘core gamer’ DNA and long-term design mindset made the transition stick.

title: How Rollic Kills 1,000 Prototypes a Year to Find Hits (Part 2)
alt: Rollic team reviews prototypes in the office playroom—rapid testing and cuts to find fun – Part 2
excerpt: Inside Rollic’s ruthless prototype-and-test machine, Hair Challenge’s 3-level test, and why fresh mechanics and POV beat glossy clones in crowded genres.

title: 7 Rules for Mobile Game Founders from Rollic’s CEO Burak Vardal (Part 3)
alt: Burak Vardal shares actionable rules for mobile game founders—keep teams light, test hard, build around core fun – Part 3
excerpt: Actionable advice for founders: play more, hire complements, keep teams light, test-and-cut fast, and build long-term loops around core fun.
